channel.title: Gs stance tut request
channel.description:
[size=30pt][font=Verdana][shadow=red,left]Hey, could someone give me the link to gs stances TUT :confused: :confused: ? im too lazy to look around in the "Tutorials" section :P[/shadow][/font][/size]
It would be really appriciated
~JoseOwnz.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2009, 11:23:20 am[/size][hr]ANSWER!! :[[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2009, 05:20:31 am[/size][hr]Mod please remove, ive found the tutorial lol :P
